summary: Root cause identified: latexmkrc uses cwd() at config load time, which fails when invoked from subdirectories. Recommended fix: compute paths relative to project root marker (lakefile.lean) instead of relying on working directory.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of TEXINPUTS path resolution failure with VimTeX subfiles, including root cause, community solutions, and implementation recommendations

next_steps: Run /plan 483 to create implementation plan for project root detection in latexmkrc
